description:
Explore the CT of the Best Male Torso of Eastern Europe '18
"A CT scan or computed tomography scan (formerly known as computed axial tomography or CAT scan) is a medical imaging technique used in radiology (x-ray) to obtain detailed internal images of the body noninvasively for diagnostic purposes."
-Wikipedia

WASD - Move Around
CTRL or Mouse 1 - Move Up
ALT or Mouse 2 - Move Down
Mouse - Look
Mouse Wheel - Change Density Treshold
Alt + F4 - Exit

Windows only
